transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

scriptLines: {Count of Activty_Demand for Activity} as long,
MapDrifted1 derive(DNA = iif({Status Code}=="CPDNA", 1, iif({Status Code}=="APDNA", 1, 0))) ~> CreateDNAColumn
ID = concat(left(toString(Date),10), concat(toString({Modality ID}), toString({Trust ID})))) ~> derivedColumn1
ID = concat(left(toString(Date),10), concat(toString({Modality ID}), toString({Trust ID})))) ~> derivedColumn2
{Monthly Demand Max} = iif(max({Monthly Demand Sum})>max({Monthly Activity Sum}), max({Monthly Demand Sum}), max({Monthly Activity Sum}))) ~> aggregate2
aggregate2, aggregate1 join(aggregate2@{Modality ID} == aggregate1@{Modality ID}
select1, select2 join(select1@{Modality ID} == select2@{Modality ID}
{Count of Activty_Demand for Activity} = toLong(byName('Count of Activty_Demand for Activity')),

sources.name: RequestRecievedStatus
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RequestRecievedStatus

sources.name: AzureSqlCOREStageStep1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlCOREStageStep1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared RequestRecievedStatus = let AdfDoc = Sql.Database("camrinsql101.database.windows.net", "camdashdevtest101", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]), InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema="dev",Item="RequestRecievedStatus"]}[Data] in InputTable;
shared AzureSqlCOREStageStep1 = let AdfDoc = Sql.Database("camrinsql101.database.windows.net", "camdashdevtest101", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]), InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema="dev",Item="AzureSqlCOREStageStep1"]}[Data] in InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let Source = #"AzureSqlCOREStageStep1",
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"ExamSite Code", "Status Time", "Modality2", "Trust Name", "Patient_Type", "Tat Type"}),
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Removed columns", {"Exam Key"}, Table.SelectRows(RequestRecievedStatus, each [Status Code] = "RR"), {"Exam Key"}, "RequestRecievedStatus", JoinKind.LeftOuter),
  #"Expanded RequestRecievedStatus 1" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "RequestRecievedStatus", {"Status Code", "Status Date", "Status Time"}, {"Status Code.2", "Status Date.1", "Status Time"}),
  #"Date Time Change" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanded RequestRecievedStatus 1", {{"Request Date", type date}, {"Event Date", type date}, {"Status Time", type text}}),
  Modality = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(#"Date Time Change", "Modality2", each if [Modality] = "R" then "Plain X-Ray" else if [Modality] = "A" then "IR" else if [Modality] = "B" then "Mammo" else if [Modality] = "C" then "CT" else if[Modality] = "M" then "MRI" else if [Modality] = "F" then "Fluoro" else if [Modality] = "U" then "NOUS"  else if [Modality] = "N" then "Nuc Med" else if[Modality] = "S" then "DEXA" else if[Modality] = "Z" then "Additional Workload" else if[Modality] = "H" then "Cardio" else if[Modality] = "D" then "Doppler" else if[Modality] = "E" then "Endo" else if[Modality] = "Y" then "Med Phys" else if[Modality] = "O" then "Obstetrics" else "other"), {{"Modality2", type text}}),
  Trust = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(Modality, "Trust Name", each if [Site] = "5HA16" then "LUHFT" else if [Site] = "5NL93" then "LUHFT" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "REM" then "LUHFT" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RQ6" then "LUHFT" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RBL" then "WUTH" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RBN" then "STHK" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RBQ" then "LHCH" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RBS" then "Alder Hey" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RBT" then "MCH" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "REN" then "CCC" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "REP" then "Womens" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RET" then "TWC" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RJR" then "COCH" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RVY" then "S&O" else if Text.Start([Site],3) = "RWW" then "WHH" else [Site]), {{"Trust Name", type text}}),
  #"Patient Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(Trust, "Patient_Type", each if [PT] = "A" then "In Patient" else if [PT] = "B" then "Out Patient" else if [PT] = "C" then "A&E Attender" else if [PT] = "D" then "Out Patient" else if [PT] = "E" then "Out Patient" else if [PT] = "F" then "Other" else if [PT] = "G" then "GP Direct Access Patient"  else if [PT] = "H" then "In Patient" else if[PT] = "J" then "A&E Attender" else if[PT] = "K" then "Tertiary Referral" else if[PT] = "N" then "In Patient" else if[PT] = "R" then "Research" else if[PT] = "T" then "Dental" else if[Modality] = "X" then "Other" else "Other"), {{"Patient_Type", type text}}),
  #"Tat Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(#"Patient Type", "Tat Type", each if ([Modality2]="CT" or [Modality2]="MRI" or [Modality2]="Fluoro" or [Modality2]="Nuc Med" or [Modality2]="Dexa") and (([PT]="A" and [Urg]="5") or [PT]="C") then "Urgent Inpatients" else 

if ([Modality2]="CT" or [Modality2]="MRI" or [Modality2]="Fluoro" or [Modality2]="Nuc Med" or [Modality2]="Dexa") and ([PT]="A" and ([Urg]="1" or [Urg]="3")) then "Non-Urgent Inpatients" else  

if ([Modality2]="CT" or [Modality2]="MRI" or [Modality2]="Plain X-Ray" or [Modality2]="Fluoro" or [Modality2]="Nuc Med" or [Modality2]="Dexa") and ([PT]="B" or [PT]="G") and [Urg]="7" then "Outpatient Faster Diagnosis Standard Cancer Pathway" else 

if ([Modality2]="CT" or [Modality2]="MRI" or [Modality2]="Fluoro" or [Modality2]="Nuc Med" or [Modality2]="Dexa") and ([PT]="B" or [PT]="G" or [PT]="D") and ([Urg]="3" or [Urg]="5") then "Urgent GP and Outpatients" else 

if ([Modality2]="CT" or [Modality2]="MRI") and ([PT]="B" or [PT]="G" or [PT]="D") and [Urg]="1" then "All Other Routine Outpatient and GP Studies" else 

if [Modality2]="Plain X-Ray" and ([PT]="A" and ([Urg]="1" or [Urg]="3")) then "Other Inpatients" else 

if [Modality2]="Plain X-Ray" and (([PT]="A" and [Urg]="5") or [PT]="C") then "Acutely Unwell/ED Patients" else 

if [Modality2]="Plain X-Ray" and ([PT]="B" or [PT]="D" or [PT]="G") and ([Urg]="5" or [Urg]="3") then "Urgent GP/Urgent Outpatients" else 

if ([Modality2]="Plain X-Ray" or [Modality2]="Fluoro" or [Modality2]="Nuc Med" or [Modality2]="Dexa") and ([PT]="B" or [PT]="D" or [PT]="G") and [Urg]="1" then "Routine GP and outpatients" else  

if [Modality2]="NOUS" or [Modality2]="IR" then "Ultrasound and interventional Radiology" else "Other"), {{"Tat Type", type text}}),
  Activity = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(#"Tat Type", "Activity.1", each if([Status Code]="ASACK" or [Status Code]="ASRMS" or [Status Code]="ASRQS" or [Status Code]="ATN" or  [Status Code]="ATP" or [Status Code]="CHBU" or  [Status Code]="CHE" or [Status Code]="CHEC" or [Status Code]="CPC" or [Status Code]="CPDNA" or [Status Code]="CPMP" or [Status Code]="CPPG" or [Status Code]="CPPR" or [Status Code]="CPR" or [Status Code]="DVR" or [Status Code]="PRTRPT") then 1 else 0), {{"Activity.1", type number}}),
  #"Activity 2" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(Activity, "Count of Activty_Demand for Activity.1", each [Activity.1]), {{"Count of Activty_Demand for Activity.1", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Inserted merged column" = Table.AddColumn(#"Activity 2", "ExamSite Code", each Text.Combine({[Site], [Room]}, ""), type text) in #"Inserted merged column";

scriptLines: window1, source1 lookup(AzureSqlCORE@{CRIS No} == source1@{CRIS No}
{Count of Activty_Demand for Activity.1} as long,
AzureSqlPTL derive({5 Weeks Wait} = iif({Weeks Waiting}>=6,1,0),

lookupExamSite derive(Site = iif ({Site} == "5HA16", "LUHFT", iif ({Site} == "5NL93", "LUHFT", iif (left({Site},3) == "REM", "LUHFT", iif (left({Site},3) == "RQ6", "LUHFT",  iif (left({Site},3) == "RQ6", "LUHFT", iif (left({Site},3) == "RQ6", "LUHFT", iif (left({Site},3) == "RQ6", "LUHFT", iif (left({Site},3) == "RBL", "WUTH", iif (left({Site},3) == "RBN", "STHK", iif (left({Site},3) == "RBQ", "LHCH", iif (left({Site},3) == "RBS", "Alder Hey", iif (left({Site},3) == "RBT", "MCH", iif (left({Site},3) == "REN", "CCC" , iif (left({Site},3) == "REP", "Womens", iif (left({Site},3) == "RET", "TWC", iif (left({Site},3) == "RJR", "COCH", iif (left({Site},3) == "RVY", "S&O", iif (left({Site},3) == "RWW", "WHH", {Site}))))))))))))))))))) ~> DeriveTrust

lookupExam derive(Modality = iif({Modality} == "R", "Plain X-Ray", iif({Modality} == "A", "IR", iif({Modality} == "B", "Mammo", iif({Modality} == "C", "CT", iif({Modality} == "M", "MRI", iif({Modality} == "F", "Fluoro", iif({Modality} == "U", "NOUS", iif({Modality} == "Z", "Additional Workload", iif({Modality} == "O", "Obstetrics", iif({Modality} == "N", "Nuc Med", iif({Modality} == "H", "Cardio", iif({Modality} == "S", "DEXA", iif({Modality} == "Y", "Med Phys", iif({Modality} == "E", "Endo", iif({Modality} == "D", "Doppler", "other")))))))))))))))) ~> deriveModlaityCode

RemoveCols derive({Booked Date} = toTimestamp(concatWS(" ", left(toString({Booked Date}),10), concatWS(":",left({Booked Time}, 2), concatWS(":",right({Booked Time}, 2),"00"))))) ~> deriveBookedDateTime
deriveBookedDateTime, filter1 lookup(RemoveCols@{Exam Key} == source1@{Exam Key},

transformations.name: SortColumns6
transformations.description: Sorting rows on columns 'Exam Room ID'

scriptLines: {Count of Activty_Demand for Activity.1} as long,

RankColumns8 derive(Target = iif({Tat Type} == "Urgent Inpatients","12 hours",iif({Tat Type} == "Non-Urgent Inpatients", "24 hours",iif({Tat Type} == "Outpatient Faster Diagnosis Standard Cancer Pathway", "3 days",iif({Tat Type} == "Urgent GP and Outpatients", "7 days",iif({Tat Type} == "All Other Routine Outpatient and GP Studies", "28 days",iif({Tat Type} == "Acutely Unwell/ED Patients", "12 hours",iif({Tat Type} == "Other Inpatients" , "7 days",iif({Tat Type} == "Urgent GP/Urgent Outpatients", "7 days",iif({Tat Type} == "Routine GP and outpatients", "28 days",iif({Tat Type} == "Ultrasound and interventional Radiology", "3 hours","0"))))))))))) ~> DeriveColumn8

RankColumns7 derive({Trust Name Group} = iif( {Trust Name} == "Womens", "REP", iif( {Trust Name} == "LUHFT", "REM", iif( {Trust Name} == "WUTH", "RBL", iif( {Trust Name} == "STHK", "RBN", iif( {Trust Name} == "S&O", "RVY", iif( {Trust Name} == "LHCH", "RBQ", iif( {Trust Name} == "Alder Hey", "RBS", iif( {Trust Name} == "MCH", "RBT", iif( {Trust Name} == "CCC", "REN", iif( {Trust Name} == "TWC", "RET", iif( {Trust Name} == "COCH", "RJR", iif( {Trust Name} == "WHH", "RWW", iif( {Trust Name} == "5M501", "REM", iif( {Trust Name} == "NTD05", "REM", "Other")))))))))))))),

{Trust Name Group2} = iif( {Trust Name} == "Womens", "Womens", iif( {Trust Name} == "LUHFT", "LUHFT", iif( {Trust Name} == "WUTH", "WUTH", iif( {Trust Name} == "STHK", "STHK", iif( {Trust Name} == "S&O", "S&O", iif( {Trust Name} == "LHCH", "LHCH", iif( {Trust Name} == "Alder Hey", "Alder Hey", iif( {Trust Name} == "MCH", "MCH", iif( {Trust Name} == "CCC", "CCC", iif( {Trust Name} == "TWC", "TWC", iif( {Trust Name} == "COCH", "COCH", iif( {Trust Name} == "WHH", "WHH", iif( {Trust Name} == "5M501", "LUHFT", iif( {Trust Name} == "NTD05", "LUHFT", "Other")))))))))))))),

{Trust Name Group3} = iif( {Trust Name} == "Womens", "REP", iif( {Trust Name} == "LUHFT", "REM", iif( {Trust Name} == "WUTH", "WUTH", iif( {Trust Name} == "STHK", "RBN", iif( {Trust Name} == "S&O", "RVY", iif( {Trust Name} == "LHCH", "RBQ", iif( {Trust Name} == "Alder Hey", "RBS", iif( {Trust Name} == "MCH", "RBT", iif( {Trust Name} == "CCC", "REN", iif( {Trust Name} == "TWC", "RET", iif( {Trust Name} == "COCH", "COCH", iif( {Trust Name} == "WHH", "RWW", "Other"))))))))))))) ~> DeriveColumn7
DropColumns6 derive({ExamSite Code} = iifNull({Exam Site},'\n',{Exam Site})+iifNull({Exam Room},'\n',{Exam Room})) ~> JointColumn6
output({Exam Room ID} as long)) ~> RankColumns6

RankColumns4 derive({Status Category} = iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "AP"), "AP", iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "AS"), "AS", iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "AT"), "AT", iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "C"), "C", iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "D"), "D", iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "E"), "E", iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "P"), "P", iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "R"), "R", iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "V"), "V", iif(startsWith({Status Code}, "W"), "W", iif({Status Code} == "BHSRAI", "ST", iif({Status Code} == "ACNCLI", "W", iif({Status Code} == "SRREPC", "ST", "0")))))))))))))) ~> DeriveColumn4
output({Patient Type ID} as long)) ~> RankColumns2
output({Referral Source ID} as long)) ~> RankColumns1
RankColumns1 sort(asc({Referral Source ID}, true)) ~> SortColumns1
RankColumns2 sort(asc({Patient Type ID}, true)) ~> SortColumns2
RankColumns6 sort(asc({Exam Room ID}, true)) ~> SortColumns6
DeriveColumn8 sort(asc({Tat Type ID}, true)) ~> SortColumns8
